Ehhh, Irelia doesn't scale well. Not only that but she has an upcoming nerf, so I would avoid her. Don't get me wrong, Irelia is INSANELY strong, but Ton specifically asked for champs that scale well, and Irelia simply doesn't fill that niche.
@@ Irelia doesn't scale well? Dude her late game potential is crazy man.

Exactly the same way Jax is?
No, as Jax scales well on what he builds because of his ult, whilst Irelia has an incredibly weak scaling off of an AD (or even AP) build.

Alright good sir. You do have a valid point, yet I disagree with it. But our differing opinions don't make much of a difference. For the OP's sake, if he enjoys Irelia, by all means, play her! Thanks for this entertaining "joust" :)
:) indeed it was entertaining :)

Irelia has mediocre AD scaling, but VERY good Attack Speed/ on hit scaling.  Between Tri Force and Hiten Style, she does a LOT of single target damage.  If you build a BotRK on her, her single target DPS is HUGE.
The tenacity definitely helps, but what's really impressive about Irelia is her single target damage with only 1-2 damage items.  She definitely scales well.

Shyv and Trundle both scale and push extremely fast while being a threat in lategame teamfights (I assume this is the type of champ you are looking for). Rengar and Volibear may be a little unorthodox but they scale great too. Hope this helps :)

> Who other than Nasus and maybe Jax scales well top lane?

Pretty much every Fighter/Assassin scales really well into late-game, and most fighters are seen as top lane champions. 
Any mage you'd send top usually scales pretty well late as well.
And marksman pretty much always scale well into late, so any marksman you can get working top usually has a solid end-game - which is mainly Jayce and Quinn, though against slow enough top-lane picks you can get champions like Vayne and Draven and Kalista to work.

Generally speaking the top-lane picks that don't scale that well late are the fighter/tanks, as defense just kind of putters out during late-game when the glass cannons get %penetrations. Most fighter/tanks are crazy powerful mid-game champions though and quite capable of finishing a game before late-game happens if they get a lead - they just don't spike late game.
